portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: おお、そうだ ミガ石が、きれてるのだが 届けてくれないか
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, that's right. The Miga Stone is broken, but could you still deliver it?

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それだ、それだ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, that's it! Give it to me.

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: お礼に、これを上げよう
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this in thanks.

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: がんばれよ
portrait_l.ascii: Do your best.

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: なんだ、渡してくれんのか
portrait_l.ascii: What, you're not gonna give it?

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: ミガ石、持ってきてくれたのか
portrait_l.ascii: Did you bring the Mika Stone?

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それだ、それだ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, now this is it. Please give it to me.

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: お礼に、これを上げよう
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this as thanks.

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: がんばれよ
portrait_l.ascii: Do your best.

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: なんだ、渡してくれんのか
portrait_l.ascii: What, you're not gonna give it?

portrait_l.name: chief
portrait_l.sjis: がんばれよ
portrait_l.ascii: Do your best.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇ、カティン鉱石 探してきてくれない
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, could you find me some Catin Ore?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: 欲しがってるお客さんがいるのよ 代わりにイイ掘り出し物をあげるから ね？おねがい
portrait_l.ascii: There's a guest who wants it. I'll give you a good bargain, okay? Please?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: それ、それ ちょーだい
portrait_l.ascii: Ah, that's it. Give it to me, please.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: このくらいでイイかしら
portrait_l.ascii: Is this enough?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: けち～
portrait_l.ascii: Cheapskate~

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇ、カティン鉱石
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, the Catin Ore,

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ね？おねがい
portrait_l.ascii: Give it. Okay? Please?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: それ、それ ちょーだい
portrait_l.ascii: That, that. Give it to me.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: このくらいでイイかしら
portrait_l.ascii: Is this enough?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつかたのむわね
portrait_l.ascii: I'll count on you again.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: けち～
portrait_l.ascii: Cheapskate~

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつかたのむわね
portrait_l.ascii: I'll count on you again.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: どうしてもキッカ薬が、 欲しいのじゃが 探してきてくれぬかのぉ
portrait_l.ascii: I need some Kikka medicine. Could you find some for me?

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それじゃ、それじゃ わしにゆずってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Ohh, that's it. Can you give it to me?

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: お礼に、これを上げよう
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this in thanks.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: この恩は忘れぬぞ
portrait_l.ascii: I will not forget this favor.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: なんじゃ、渡してくれぬのか
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, you're not going to give it?

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: どこかに キッカ薬が、 ないかの～
portrait_l.ascii: Is there any Kikka medicine anywhere?

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それじゃ、それじゃ わしにゆずってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Ohh, that's it. Please give it to me.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: お礼に、これを上げよう
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this in thanks.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: この恩は忘れぬぞ
portrait_l.ascii: I will not forget this favor.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: なんじゃ、渡してくれぬのか
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, you're not going to give it?

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: この恩は忘れぬぞ
portrait_l.ascii: I will not forget this favor.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: ああ、そこのキミ 魔よけのお守りを 見たことがないかい？
portrait_l.ascii: Ah, you there. Have you seen a charm that protects from evil?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 最近、ホントに身の危険感じるんだよね どこかに無いかな～
portrait_l.ascii: Recently, I've been really worried about my safety. Where could it be?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: それだよそれそれ ボクに譲ってよ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, there it is. Please give it to me.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: お礼にこれをあげよう
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this as thanks.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Appreciate it.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: しょうがない、他を探すよ
portrait_l.ascii: Okay then, I'll look for another.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: どこかに 魔よけのお守り、ないかな～
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a charm that protects from evil anywhere?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: それだよそれそれ ボクに譲ってよ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, there it is. Please give it to me.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: お礼にこれをあげよう
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this as thanks.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Appreciate it.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: しょうがない、他を探すよ
portrait_l.ascii: Okay then. I'll look for another.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Appreciate it.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: これから、探索かい？ ついでに、逆光ライト 探してきてくれないかな
portrait_l.ascii: Going out for something? While you're out, could you find me a Backlight Lamp?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: いまなら、口じゃ言えないくらい 良いものと交換だ
portrait_l.ascii: In exchange, I'll give you something quite nice. I can't tell what it is now though.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それだよ、それ
portrait_l.ascii: Ahh, that's it.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: え？ そんなにすごいモンじゃない？
portrait_l.ascii: Hm? It's not that great?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: オレは商売が上手いんだよ アハハハハ
portrait_l.ascii: Well, I'm pretty good at business. Ahahaha.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: あ～あ～ ほんと、これは良いものなのに
portrait_l.ascii: Ahh. Too bad, it's actually pretty good.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ついででいいから、 逆光ライト 探してきてくれないかな
portrait_l.ascii: It's fine if you're busy, but I'd really appreciate it if you could find me a Backlight Lamp.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: どこかの町の 釣りの景品になってるって 聞いた事があるね
portrait_l.ascii: I've heard that it's a fishing prize in some town.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それだよ、それ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, there it is!

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thank you. Accept this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: え？ そんなにすごいモンじゃない？
portrait_l.ascii: Hm? It's not that great?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: オレは商売が上手いんだよ アハハハハ
portrait_l.ascii: Well, I'm pretty good at business. Ahahahaha.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: あ～あ～ ほんと、これは良いものなのに
portrait_l.ascii: Ahh~ Too bad, it really is quite good.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again sometime.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: まだ、しばらく、こっちにいるかい？
portrait_l.ascii: Will you be staying here for awhile?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: このあたり、うろつくんなら ついでに、黒の鉱石 探してきてくれないかな
portrait_l.ascii: If you are, then could you take the opportunity to find some black ore for me?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: 良いものと交換してやるよ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you something good for it.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: おぉ！、それだよ ホント、すまねぇ
portrait_l.ascii: Yeah! That's it.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつかな 体に気ぃつけてな
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again, okay? Take care of yourself.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: とほほ、駄目かい
portrait_l.ascii: Tohoho, no good?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: 先を急ぐんならしょうがない 黒の鉱石は惜しいが
portrait_l.ascii: If you're in a hurry, it's fine. Let me know if you find any Black Ore though.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: おぉ！、それだよ ホント、すまねぇ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh! That's it!

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつかな 体に気ぃつけてな
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again, okay? Take care of yourself.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: とほほ、駄目かい
portrait_l.ascii: Tohoho, no good?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつかな 体に気ぃつけてな
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again. Take care of yourself.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: これから、探索かい？ ついでに、吸血ポンプ 探してきてくれないかな
portrait_l.ascii: Are you about to go out? Could you find me a Blood-Sucking Pump from out there?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: いまなら、口じゃ言えないくらい 良いものと 交換だ
portrait_l.ascii: In exchange, I'll give you something really good. Can't tell you what it is just yet.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それだよ、それ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh yeah, that's it!

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again sometime.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: あ～あ～ ほんと、これは良いものなのに
portrait_l.ascii: Ah~ Too bad, it really is quite good.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ついででいいから、 吸血ポンプ 探してきてくれないかな
portrait_l.ascii: It's fine if it's in the way, but could you find me a Blood-Sucking Pump, please?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: おお、それだよ、それ
portrait_l.ascii: Oh yeah, that's it.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again sometime.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: あ～あ～ ほんと、これは良いものなのに
portrait_l.ascii: Ah~ Too bad, it's actually pretty good.

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again sometime.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: あ～～無性に、 卵かけ飯が喰いたい～
portrait_l.ascii: Ah~ I want to eat Rice with ridiculous amounts of Eggs on it.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: でも、ここから離れられない～
portrait_l.ascii: But, I can't move away from here~

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: はっ！ この香りはまさかキミ！
portrait_l.ascii: Aha! That smell, could it be eggs?

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's talk again sometime.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: 冷やかしかよ ちくしょう～～～
portrait_l.ascii: It's getting cold Damn it~

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: 卵かけ飯
portrait_l.ascii: Rice with egg on top

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.ascii: Ahh~

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: はっ！ この香りはまさかキミ！
portrait_l.ascii: Ha! That smell is it eggs?

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう かわりにコレを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Take this in exchange.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again sometime.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: 冷やかしかよ ちくしょう～～～
portrait_l.ascii: It's getting cold Damn it~

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: またいつか
portrait_l.ascii: Let's do this again.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇ、キミ このあたりで、エールの実を見なかった
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, you. Have you seen some Alle Fruit?

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: あれがあれば、 なんとかなりそうなんだけど
portrait_l.ascii: If I had that, I think I could make it. Maybe.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: それよ、ねぇ私に譲ってよ
portrait_l.ascii: There it is. Give it to me.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう お礼と言っちゃなんだけど
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ホントに無理言って、 ごめんなさいね
portrait_l.ascii: I'm really sorry about asking for something so unreasonable

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: 自分で探すわよ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll look for it myself.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: エールの実 どこかに無いかしら
portrait_l.ascii: I wonder if the Alle Fruit is here anywhere?

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: それよ、ねぇ私に譲ってよ
portrait_l.ascii: There it is. Please give it to me.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ありがとう お礼と言っちゃなんだけど
portrait_l.ascii: Thanks.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ホントに無理言って、 ごめんなさいね
portrait_l.ascii: I'm really sorry about asking for something so unreasonable.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: 自分で探すわよ
portrait_l.ascii: I guess I'll look for it myself.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ホントに無理言って、 ごめんなさいね
portrait_l.ascii: I'm really sorry about asking for something so unreasonable.
